summary: Dr. Jackie Allen Syme, Jr. was charged with unprofessional conduct, professional/physical/mental incompetence, habitual intoxication, and providing professional services while under the influence of alcohol. These charges stemmed from chronic alcohol abuse, poor record-keeping, and unprofessional behavior. His medical license was reprimanded and suspended for a minimum of one year, and he is required to enroll in the Maryland Professional Rehabilitation Program (MPRP).
